author: pieterdavid
body:
Technical change, no differences expected.

- moved DebugHelpers header from GsfTracking/src to TrackFitters/interface
- made MessageLogger category a parameter
- stopped printing layer number to remove dependency on specific DetIds and TrackerTopology

as discussed with @VinInn and @mmusich  in #19398 

cc: @OlivierBondu @alesaggio @vidalm 

tracked at  #19398
title: Tracker sub-DetId deprecation for TrackFitters DebugHelpers.h
